SEARCH
Package com.dua3.utility.fx.controls

Class InputControlBuilder<B extends InputControlBuilder<B,V>,V>

java.lang.Object
com.dua3.utility.fx.controls.InputControlBuilder<B,V>
Type Parameters:
B - the specific subtype of the builder (to enable method chaining).
V - the type of value handled by the input control being built.
Direct Known Subclasses:
FileInputBuilder, SliderBuilder
public abstract class InputControlBuilder<B extends InputControlBuilder<B,V>,V> extends Object
An abstract base class for building input controls with customizable properties and behavior. This generic builder class supports method chaining and facilitates the creation of input controls with a variety of configurations.

    • onChange

      public B onChange(Consumer<@Nullable V> onChange)
      Sets a callback to be invoked when the value of the slider changes.
      Parameters:
      onChange - a DoubleConsumer that will be invoked with the new slider value whenever it changes
      Returns:
      this instance of SliderBuilder for method chaining.

    • applyIfNonNull

      protected <T> void applyIfNonNull(@Nullable T obj, Consumer<T> consumer)
      Applies the given consumer function to the input object if the object is not null. This method serves as a utility to conditionally execute operations on non-null objects.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of the object being checked and passed to the consumer
      Parameters:
      obj - the object to check for nullability and pass to the consumer if non-null
      consumer - the operation to apply to the object if it is not null

    • getDefault

      protected Supplier<@Nullable V> getDefault()
      Retrieves the default value supplier associated with this instance.
      Returns:
      a Supplier that provides the default value, or null if no default value supplier is set.

    • getOnChangeListeners

      protected Collection<Consumer<@Nullable V>> getOnChangeListeners()
      Retrieves the list of change listeners associated with this control builder. These listeners are invoked whenever the value of the associated input control changes.
      Returns:
      a list of Consumer instances that handle value change events, or an empty list if no listeners have been added.

    • applyTo

      protected void applyTo(InputControl<V> control)
      Adds listeners to monitor and respond to changes in the value of the given InputControl. Each registered change listener in onChangeListeners will be called whenever the control's value is updated.
      Parameters:
      control - the InputControl instance to which the change listeners will be applied
